item.title: Rust for Python Programmers
item.description: Here’s just a bunch of resources about learning the Rust programming language from the perspective of a Python programmer. Carefully exploring Rust as a Python developer Rust for Python Programmers From Python to Rust, a video series by “Bedroom Builds”
item.content:
Here’s just a bunch of resources about learning the Rust programming language from the perspective of a Python programmer.

  • Carefully exploring Rust as a Python developer
  • Rust for Python Programmers
  • From Python to Rust, a video series by “Bedroom Builds”
